title: How to Make Orange Blossom Sugar

steps.headline: If you haven't already dried the orange blossom flowers, do so first.
Place the dried orange blossom flowers and sugar into a mortar and grind them well.
Remove from the mortar.
steps.description: Push and rub the ground petals and sugar through a fine sieve.

steps.headline: Pour the orange blossom sugar into a dry and clean storage jar or container.
steps.description: Allow the flavours to infuse for at least a week before using.

steps.headline: Use as needed.
steps.description: Orange blossom sugar can be used in baking or sprinkled over food. It can also be added to drinks to sweeten and flavour.

text: If you haven't already dried the orange blossom flowers, do so first.  Place the dried orange blossom flowers and sugar into a mortar and grind them well.  Remove from the mortar. Push and rub the ground petals and sugar through a fine sieve. Pour the orange blossom sugar into a dry and clean storage jar or container. Allow the flavours to infuse for at least a week before using. Use as needed. Orange blossom sugar can be used in baking or sprinkled over food. It can also be added to drinks to sweeten and flavour.
